heroInfo.introduction: Software Engineer, Frontend Developer, UI Developer, React Developer
heroInfo.description: Frontend Developer with 6+ years of experience in web development and design. Skilled in UI/UX design, requirement analysis, and production support. Proven ability to deliver scalable solutions, optimize performance, and collaborate effectively with teams to resolve issues and improve products.

listOfAchievements.text: Recognized as a Top 10 Finalist in the GitHub Open Source Challenge for contributing to large-scale full-stack projects and optimizing existing frameworks.
Achieved MongoDB Certified Developer status, showcasing advanced knowledge of NoSQL database design, indexing, and query optimization.
Earned AWS Certified Developer – Associate, demonstrating expertise in deploying and managing full-stack applications using AWS cloud services.

projects.headline1: Developed and maintained Mashreq Bank’s internal application using React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, optimizing performance with React Hook Form, custom hooks, useMemo, and useCallback.
projects.headline2: Collaborated with cross-functional teams, conducted code reviews, managed production deployments, optimized application performance, debugged defects, and resolved SonarQube issues to ensure application stability, performance, and code quality.

projects.headline1: Worked on Lowe's store selling application, developed new software features, and collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance product functionality and user experience.
projects.headline2: Managed defect resolution, incident triage, production deployments, and provided support during high-traffic periods, addressing sonar issues, rectifying code smells, and managing test coverage gaps.

projects.headline1: Developed new components and resolved issues on the website using React, HTML, CSS, and JS, estimated time & efforts, and completed tasks within deadlines.
projects.headline2: Conducted code reviews, participated in daily standups, and increased website functionality by 20% through implementing new components.

projects.headline1: Used ReactJS, HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript to develop software solutions for clients.
projects.headline2: Managed the delivery of the ET Echo project independently, earning recognition for providing effective knowledge transfer (KT) and increased client satisfaction by 15% through timely software solution delivery.

qualifications.headline1: Graduated with First-Class Distinction in B.Tech CSE.
qualifications.headline2: Won Hackathon at IIT Bombay (1st Prize).
